prompts: Create a whimsical fairy-type Pokemon that has a fluffy blue mane and a small pink body.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon with a serene expression, soft pastel colors, and an enchanting aura.
Design a cute Psychic-type Pokemon that resembles a small creature with oversized ears and a shy demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique hairstyle, is mostly blue, and can float gracefully in the air.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies calmness, featuring soft colors and a delicate appearance.
Make a fairy-like Pokemon that has a playful personality and a body shape reminiscent of a small balloon.
Give me a Pokemon with a dreamy look, combining pastel blue and pink shades in its design.
